item.title: Security Center - Application security - 2024-07-22
item.description: • Customers can now archive multiple Security Insights at the same time. Go to Security Center > Security Insights and select the insights to archive.

item.title: API Shield - API Discovery's hostname variables
item.description: Customers can now see when API Discovery groups similar subdomains with the same methods and paths, making it easy to discover and manage APIs that share many vanity domains or subdomains.

item.title: API Shield - Route API requests using API Routing
item.description: Customers can now route requests to different back-end services through API Routing, creating a unified front for their APIs distributed across otherwise disparate systems.

item.title: Page Shield - Cookie Monitor now available
item.description: Page Shield now captures HTTP cookies set and used by your web application. The list of detected cookies in available in the Cloudflare dashboard or via API.

item.title: WAF - Application security - 2024-06-18 - Emergency
item.description:
Ruleset Rule ID Legacy Rule ID Description Previous Action New Action Comments
Cloudflare Specials ...1a9fccda  100652 PHP CGI - Information Disclosure - CVE:CVE-2024-4577 N/A Block N/A
Cloudflare Specials ...2b931b04  100653 Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager - Information Disclosure - CVE:CVE-2024-29849 N/A Block N/A

item.title: Page Shield - Added filter operators for scripts and connections
item.description: You can now filter scripts and connections in the Cloudflare dashboard using the does not contain operator. Pages associated with scripts and connections can be filtered by includes, starts with, and ends with.

item.title: WAF - Application security - 2024-06-06 - Emergency
item.description:
Ruleset Rule ID Legacy Rule ID Description Previous Action New Action Comments
Cloudflare Specials ...00a71dce  100651 Atlassian Confluence - Remote Code Execution - CVE:CVE-2024-21683 N/A Block N/A

item.title: DDoS protection - DDoS alerts now available for EU CMB customers
item.description: DDoS alerts are now available for EU Customer Metadata Boundary (CMB) customers. This includes all DDoS alert type (Standard and Advanced) for both HTTP DDoS attacks and L3/4 DDoS attacks.

item.title: WAF - Improved detection capabilities
item.description: WAF attack score now automatically detects and decodes Base64 and JavaScript (Unicode escape sequences) in HTTP requests. This update is available for all customers with access to WAF attack score (Business customers with access to a single field and Enterprise customers).

item.title: API Shield - Use JWT claims in Advanced Rate Limiting, Transform Rules, and as session IDs
item.description: Customers can now use the fields inside JSON Web Tokens (known as claims) as session identifiers in API Shield, to count values in Advanced Rate Limiting, and to send on useful information in Transform Rules.

item.title: API Shield - Build Sequence Mitigation rules via the Cloudflare dashboard
item.description: Customers can now build Sequence Mitigation rules with a new user interface inside the API Shield section of the Cloudflare dashboard .

item.title: Page Shield - Suggestions for the default directive
item.description: When creating a policy in the dashboard, default directive aggregates suggestions of monitored scripts and connections data, enabling defining default directive easier.

item.title: DDoS protection - Network Analytics now supported for EU CMB customers
item.description:
The Network Analytics dashboard is available to customers that have opted in to the EU Customer Metadata Boundary (CMB) solution. This also includes Network Analytics Logs (Logpush) and GraphQL API.

API users can ensure they are routed properly by directing their API requests at eu.api.cloudflare.com.

item.title: Page Shield - Individual threat intelligence categories
item.description: Instead of aggregating categories of URL and domain data from threat intelligence, they are now listed per type.

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2024-03-25
item.description: • Added more supported languages.

item.title: Page Shield - Increase allowed length per policy
item.description: Now each policy supports up to 6,000 characters.

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2023-07-31
item.description:
• Added [turnstile.isExpired].
  • Added uk language.

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2023-05-25
item.description: • Added idempotency support for POST /siteverify requests via the idempotency_key parameter.

item.title: DDoS protection - Application security - Network-layer DDoS managed ruleset - 2023-04-17
item.description:
Previously, only a subset of rules were exposed publicly. In rare situations, these rules can cause false positives. When this happens, you can customize their behavior using overrides.

Besides these rules, the DDoS managed rules contain other rules that do not cause issues. Until now, these rules were not shown in the dashboard or referenced in the documentation.

Cloudflare now shows all rules in the dashboard, including these high-confidence rules. This means that packets matching these rules will now have the correct rule identifier. The newly published rules are read-only and you cannot disable them.

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2023-04-17
item.description:
• Added references to Turnstile Public API.
  • Added references for [after-interactive-callback], [before-interactive-callback], and [unsupported-callback].

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2023-03-06
item.description: • Added [execution] and [appearance].

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2023-02-15
item.description: • Added the [turnstile.ready] callback.

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2023-02-01
item.description: • Added the [data-]language parameter.

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2022-12-12
item.description: • POST /siteverify supports JSON requests now.

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2022-11-11
item.description: • Added retry and retry-interval for controlling retry behavior.

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2022-10-28
item.description:
• Renamed the [data-]expired-callback callback to [data-]timeout-callback (called when the challenge times out).
  • Added the [data-]expired-callback callback (called when the token expires).

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2022-10-24
item.description:
• Added response-field and response-field-name for controlling the input element created by Turnstile.
  • Added option for changing the size of the Turnstile widget.

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2022-10-13
item.description:
• Added validation for action: /^[a-z0-9_-]{0,32}$/i
  • Added validation for cData: /^[a-z0-9_-]{0,255}$/i

item.title: Turnstile - Application security - 2022-10-11
item.description: • Added turnstile.remove
